don't know how but this torrent was hard for my E-HDD to process, overloaded the cache and i had a lot of hassle sorting it out. ended up havening to close utorrent, ctrlaltdel the process dead then remove all the files and the torrent listing to fix it. not bitching, just letting others know in case it happens to them.
